original: thog med sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa //
analyzed: thog med sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa //

original: rnam shes gsum po bsgoms pas ni //
analyzed: rnam shes gsum po bsgoms pas ni //

original: dus gsum du ni spyad pa'i las //
analyzed: dus gsum du ni spyad pa'i las //
translated: The karma of conduct in the three times

original: rnam shes gsum gyi rgyu can no //
analyzed: rnam shes gsum gyi rgyu can no //

original: ye shes gsum po zhes brjod pa //
analyzed: ye shes gsum po zhes brjod pa //
translated: The three wisdoms are said to be

original: de yang snang ba tsam nyid de //
analyzed: de yang snang ba tsam nyid de //

original: dang po ma rig shes par bya //
analyzed: dang po ma rig shes par bya //
translated: The first is known as ignorance.

original: gnyis pa de bzhin sems las byung //
analyzed: gnyis pa de bzhin sems las byung //

original: gsum pa sems zhes bya 'di rnams //
analyzed: gsum pa sems zhes bya 'di rnams //

original: stong nyid gsum du brjod pa yin //
analyzed: stong nyid gsum du brjod pa yin //

original: stong nyid gsum las byung ba'i rlung //
analyzed: stong nyid gsum las byung ba'i rlung //

original: de nyid dang ni kun du gnas //
analyzed: de nyid dang ni kun du gnas //

original: de yi bzhon pa nyid 'gyur te //
analyzed: de yi bzhon pa nyid 'gyur te //

original: bdag nyid kyang ni stong pa'i phyir //
analyzed: bdag nyid kyang ni stong pa'i phyir //

original: rnam shes las ni rlung 'byung ste //
analyzed: rnam shes las ni rlung 'byung ste //
translated: From consciousness, wind arises;

original: de las me ni yang dag 'byung //
analyzed: de las me ni yang dag 'byung //
translated: From that, fire arises perfectly;

original: de las chu ni 'byung bar 'gyur //
analyzed: de las chu ni 'byung bar 'gyur //

analyzed: de las yang ni skye mched 'byung //

original: de las ye shes rang bzhin rnams //
analyzed: de las ye shes rang bzhin rnams //

original: brgya ni drug cu dang bcas slar //
analyzed: brgya ni drug cu dang bcas slar //
translated: The one hundred and sixty

original: skad cig 'dod chags bral dang 'jigs //
analyzed: skad cig 'dod chags bral dang 'jigs //

original: la lar mya ngan zhi ba nyid //
analyzed: la lar mya ngan zhi ba nyid //

original: la lar byams dang snying rje dang // so sor rtog dang yid gang dang // la lar sred pa rnam rtog dang // rig bya rig dang ngo che shes //
analyzed: la lar byams dang snying rje dang // so sor rtog dang yid gang dang // la lar sred pa rnam rtog dang // rig bya rig dang ngo che shes //
translated: To some, it is the object of cognition and the cognizer,ğŸ”½To some, it is the great self-knowing awareness.

original: dal dang mi dge rang bzhin med //
analyzed: dal dang mi dge rang bzhin med //
translated: To some, it is the nature of laziness and non-virtue,ğŸ”½To some, it is appropriation and so forth,ğŸ”½To some, it is hunger, thirst, and miserliness,

original: nye bar len dang sogs pa dang // la lar bkres skom ser sna dang // la lar dogs dang tshor pa ste //
analyzed: nye bar len dang sogs pa dang // la lar bkres skom ser sna dang // la lar dogs dang tshor pa ste //

original: sems kyi rang bzhin 'di rnams ni //
analyzed: sems kyi rang bzhin 'di rnams ni //

original: snang ba'i ye shes rgyu can no //
analyzed: snang ba'i ye shes rgyu can no //

original: skad cig 'dod chags de bzhin dga' //ğŸ”½la lar gdug pa nus pa dang // la lar nga rgyal de bzhin spro //
analyzed: skad cig 'dod chags de bzhin dga' // la lar gdug pa nus pa dang // la lar nga rgyal de bzhin spro //

original: la lar rangs pa btsan thabs 'gar //
analyzed: la lar rangs pa btsan thabs 'gar //
translated: To some, it is delight and forcefulness,

original: la lar brtan dang stobs can nyid //
analyzed: la lar brtan dang stobs can nyid //
translated: To some, it is stability and strength.

original: la lar ngag ni gsal bar 'gyur //
analyzed: la lar ngag ni gsal bar 'gyur //
translated: To some, it is clear speech.ğŸ”½To some, it is truth and untruth,

original: la lar bden dang mi bden dang// la lar spro byed byed po yang //
analyzed: la lar bden dang mi bden dang// la lar spro byed byed po yang //
translated: To some, it is enthusiasm and action.ğŸ”½To some, it is heroism and diligence,

analyzed: la lar dpa' bo brtson 'grus dang // ngo tsha med dang bskul ba 'gar //

analyzed: 'gar yang ngo mtshar drag po dang // zhe 'gras sbyin pa po nyid dang // mi srun pa nyid gya gyu nyid //

analyzed: rnam par sgeg pa'ang sems las byung //

original: brjed ngas pa dang la lar 'khrul //
analyzed: brjed ngas pa dang la lar 'khrul //

original: la lar rnam par g-yeng ba nyid //
analyzed: la lar rnam par g-yeng ba nyid //

original: le lo nyid dang la lar ngal //
analyzed: le lo nyid dang la lar ngal //

analyzed: la lar mi smra'i dngos por 'gyur //

original: la lar the tshom nyid shes bya //
analyzed: la lar the tshom nyid shes bya //
translated: sometimes a doubt that is to be known.

original: ma rig pa yi dus su 'byung //
analyzed: ma rig pa yi dus su 'byung //
translated: It arises at the time of ignorance.

original: ye shes rang bzhin 'di rnams ni //
analyzed: ye shes rang bzhin 'di rnams ni //

analyzed: rim pa 'di yis thim 'gyur te //
